- Administrative Staff: Wu Hua-Lun, Tseng Yu-Ping


### Thursday, May 9, 2024

accommodation at Carro Edeg Hotel

13:00 - 13:30 | Visit to Hargeisa Group Hospital, Director, Dr. Abdirahman, and Deputy Director, Dr. Adnan

17:00 - 18:00 | Visit to Taiwan Medical Mission (TMM) in Somaliland

18:00 - 20:00 | Dinner with TMM at Damal Hotel Restaurant

All day        | Day off
